basics.name: Alan Gustavo Bardales Mendoza
basics.label: Full Stack developer with more than 7 years of experience.
basics.summary: Develop myself in a company that promotes the use of technology to improve the lifestyle of the people, to innovate and create new products. Using state-of-the-art resources where new technologies are included and working with them. Always be at the forefront of new technologies learning to develop in them.

location.address: Av. del Marques Num. 10, Rinconada la Redonda, int. 29

work.name: GE Aerospace
work.summary: Part of the team responsible for the development of the software used in the aerospace industry.

work.name: Solo Trucking
work.summary: Development and support of load management systems. - Design and implementation of full-stack features/services that are scalable, highly-available, and deployed via CI/CD. - Participation in all-aspects of the engineering life-cycle including project planning, designing and implementing features. - Team Lead for the new loads management system project and SOLO App project refactor. - Technological infrastructure planning. - Requirements assessment. Technologies used: Nodejs(Backend), Vue(Frontend), Heroku, AWS (S3, Lambda), React Native.

work.name: Huawei Latinoamerica
work.summary: Support for the Huawei Cloud on Storage Technology.  - Level 2 Support for the Elastic Volume Service. - Automation Scripts and creation of dashboards. - API Integration. - Ticket Handling. - Alarm Handling. - Change Management. - Linux Servers Administration. Technologies used: Openstack, Python, Shell.
